mainText:
I was fresh out of college and excited about the face of the future.  Steve was a visionary with an inspiration that changed my carrier from accounting to computers. Apple addressed all that I was interested in for my home computer needs.  It
 made life with a computer at home so easy and intuitive. Thank you so much delivering on the promise of computers for everyone.

You will be remembered through the ages with the likes of Ford, Edison, Jefferson, Disney and even the Beatles.
header: Jan 3 1983 - Time Magazine "the Computer Moves In"
author: Allan
